document_data.name: Minda
document_data.mainbody:
'''Minda''' was a young noblewoman from [[Cormyr]] ''circa'' [[1357 DR]].

{{quote|''"Go ahead, Giogi," a slurred female voice encouraged some unseen gentleman. "Do your impression of His Majesty. Giogi does the most on-target imitation, you can just close your eyes and picture the old stuffed codger... Pleeease, Giogi."...
"Oh, go ahead, Giogi," wheedled the slurred female voice [[Alias]] recognized from earlier. "Just once. He really does sound just like King Azoun."...
"Giogi, do it for me, please?"
For gods' sake, Giogi, Alias thought, would you just get it over with?''}}
document_data.History:
In 1357 DR, tipsy Minda was unwittingly instrumental in the assassination attempt on [[Giogioni Wyvernspur]]'s life during the wedding reception between [[Gaylyn Wyvernspur]] and [[Frefford Wyvernspur]]. She continuously asked and goaded Giogi to do his famous imitation of King [[Azoun Obarskyr IV]]. He did. It triggered the assassin's magical azure bonds, forcing her to attack the source of Azoun's voice.

<nowiki> </nowiki>Even though Giogi survived, one of the guests, [[Darol]], received a slash to his face, which made Minda swoon over him, to Giogi's disappointment as he spent all day trying to impress the young lady. Darol later was given permission to accompany Minda's carriage back to Suzail.
